title: What's the place to find tech and product reviewers online? - Quora

response.answer_text: I am reading this magazine (Digit) for more than 5+ Years. Their review are genuine. I generally refer to them whenever i would like to buy some gadgets You can buy the monthly magazine or check their online presence. Technology Advice, Product Reviews, Latest News, Free Downloads You can like them on Facebook as well - https://www.facebook.com/thinkdigit Here is the twitter page Digit (@digitindia) | Twitter You will not be disappointed i can guarantee based on my experience so far
